alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 26 at 2:09PM MST until August 26 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE PARIA RIVER REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 205 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Paria River watershed. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Rain has since ended but runoff continues. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Paria River. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Paria River. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... White Pocket, Paria River Slot Canyon, Paria Canyon, Cottonwood Teepees Trailhead, The Wave, Rainbow Valley Trailhead and Stateline CG. This includes the following slot canyons... Paria River upstream of Lees Ferry. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Coyote Wash and Paria River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Get out of the Paria River slot canyon! Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Normally dry washes, slot canyons and creeks can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
